data.title: Tesla’s Effort To Short-Circuit Nikola Lawsuit Fizzles As Patent Office Denies Door Argument
data.text: The upstart maker of electric trucks powered by hydrogen fuel cells and batteries claims a small victory after the U.S. Patent and Trademark Office denied Tesla's attempt to invalidate its side door patent.

data.title: Tesla Share Can't Stop & Won't Stop
data.text: Tesla (TSLA) is up 75% so far this year, appearing to defy logic

data.title: Tesla Cybertruck will 'float' for a bit, according to Elon Musk
data.text: Why would an electric pickup need to float? It's not clear.

data.title: Tesla Stock Could Reach $2,000 Over The Next Decade
data.text:
TSLA stock has more than doubled over the past month, and there's reason to believe that Tesla is going to $2,000 in the long run. 
The post Tesla Stock Could Reach $2,000 Over The Next Decade appeared first on InvestorPlace.

data.title: Coronavirus Has Hurt Production, Not Demand for Tesla
data.text: TSLA stock has been hot, rebounding 100% from the March lows. The coronavirus may have disrupted production, but demand holds strong.

data.title: The Incredible Run in Tesla Stock Defies Logic Completely
data.text: It's perfectly okay to invest in Tesla, but that doesn't mean you should chase TSLA stock at any price. Here's why caution is required.
